dmca.title: [ABUSE] Notice of copyright infringement (http://www.warezover.com)
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Monday, October 18, 2004 10:37 AM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Notice of copyright infringement
(http://www.warezover.com)]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

For your review.
- --
Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/aup.html


- -------- Original Message --------
Subject: [ABUSE] Notice of copyright infringement (http://www.warezover.com)
Date: Mon, 18 Oct 2004 10:03:11 -0400
From: Charles Tonti <charles@templatemonster.com> (TemplateMonster)
Reply-To: piracy@templatemonster.com
Organization: www.TemplateMonster.com
To: abuse@theplanet.com, legal@theplanet.com

To whom it may concern
Dear Sirs,

We at Artvertex, Inc. have come to be aware that you or your customers
are hosting a website that is a copyright infringement of our website
Template Monster content at the address http://www.templatemonster.com
The website in question is http://www.warezover.com. We have the
evidence that this site illegally distributes our products without being
assigned ANY copyright license.
http://www.warezover.com/forum/forumdisplay.php?f=9
Our website clearly states "Website pages content copyright - 2002-2003
Artvertex, Inc." The presence of this material on your server is illegal.
Website content cannot be reproduced, copied, or edited in any manner or
medium and is therefore making you posses illegal material.
US copyright laws protect all parts of this material.
The owner of this website has been notified of his actions, and has been
told the consequences. If the site is not removed from your servers
within the next 10 days our Copyright attorney will file a civil lawsuit
in federal court against both you and the owner of the site.
I strongly urge you to delete the hosting account for
http://www.warezover.com within those 10 days, before this action is
taken. This site is attempting to profit from our material and therefore
the U.S. attorneys can get involved.
If ALL of this material is removed within 10 days then no action will be
taken against you or the site owner, and neither will be convicted of a
federal crime.
This the 3rd hosting account for this website, all previous were
closed due to our notifications.
Please remove the account as soon as you receive this if possible.
- --
Best regards,
Charles Tonti
Legal assistant
Artvertex, Inc.
22 Jordan Road
NY, Troy, 12180
Tel:  19174770238 ext 106
mailto:charles@templatemonster.com

- --
Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/aup.html
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.2.5 (MingW32)
Comment: Using GnuPG with Thunderbird - http://enigmail.mozdev.org

iD8DBQFBc+MLvK/XpJs6oyURAsadAJ0eNXBUVZzv6NeP8mfNVzqX96nRoACgpDzP
qx2Sbysx2SDz6nFH2PYqCls=
=S97k
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----

Attachments:
